title: So I'm like 90% sure I'm going back to school starting spring semester
body:
To be a high school math teacher, potentially junior high. Still debating on that one..

Fact is, this countries education system is fucked and one of the biggest areas I notice this is with math. I actually find math to be extremely important in the development of the brain at young, impressionable ages. And while I've never been great at it myself, I've never actually taken the time to get good at it aside from my senior year when I finally had a good math teacher. And I aced the class. 

I'm also really good at relating with folks and conveying my teachings coherently and clearly. I want to do something to be impactful and while underpaid and under appreciated with great stress, the positives outweighs the negatives and I'm pretty excited to meet with an advisor in December to take my ass back to school ten years later.

fuck tryndamere
